pages.text: If you entered this world with an feruchemical ability, you're called a $(6)ferring$(). If you have access to all sixteen feruchemical abilities, you're called a $(6)Feruchemist$().
pages.title: cosmere:copper_bracelet_metalmind

pages.text: Depending on what kind of metal you have access to, a metalmind of the corresponding metal will let you store and tap attributes.
